EmailTemplate.name: Budget Revision Internally Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: A Budget Revision for {!AmendmentRequest__c.ProgramName__c} has been submitted for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User, A budget revision for {!AmendmentRequest__c.ProgramName__c} has been submitted for your approval. Please follow the link below to review and submit it to USBE.
Click here
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
